generated_body: In reading "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," the user may expect an exploration of the strategic decisions behind the continued presence of this item on McDonald's menu. The article is likely to discuss historical context, including the origins of the Filet-O-Fish and its role in the company's marketing strategy, particularly in relation to consumer preferences and seasonal promotions. Additionally, it may examine current trends in fast food and fish consumption, suggesting that the Filet-O-Fish's enduring popularity could be linked to evolving customer tastes or specific demographic targeting.
